title: User Authentication System - Requirements
response:
Feedback Summary (3 comments):

General Comments:
1. 登录、注册、忘记密码和修改密码等功能注意使用supabase自带的功能，避免重复造轮子

Specific Text Comments:
1. "- Should we support social login (Google, GitHub, ...": 当前阶段不需要这些功能
2. "- Session Management: JWT with refresh tokens": supabase.js库中已包含相关功能，不需另外处理

comments.comment: 当前阶段不需要这些功能
comments.selectedText:
- Should we support social login (Google, GitHub, etc.)?
- Do we need to implement 2FA?
- What are the password complexity requirements?

comments.comment: supabase.js库中已包含相关功能，不需另外处理
comments.selectedText: - Session Management: JWT with refresh tokens

comments.comment: 登录、注册、忘记密码和修改密码等功能注意使用supabase自带的功能，避免重复造轮子
